A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Horrible.
1. Destroys any credibility of training for the Force. Now if you can use it\, you are a Master by week 2 and can kill elite trained guards with a weapon you had never seen before 2 weeks ago.
2. Long boring chase through space? Seriously? They did a Space Chase scene while two completely unnecessary people go and succeed in doing nothing but getting more Rebels killed.
3. Destroyed Luke's character\, and any nobility in the Jedi Order.
4. Disregards plot points and questions that the previous movie created.
5. BAD JOKES. The comedy is so off. 
6. I'm done\, this is just raising my blood pressure the more I think about it.

Please\, just don't give Disney any money for this. Make them make Lucasfilm create better movies.
